nodes.text: Kephess's Redoubt was a military bunker used by Kephess and his Warstalkers as their main base of operations during the Battle of Denova. When an enemy strike team tried to storm the Redoubt, Kephess opposed them with heavy walkers, Trandoshan Warstalkers and Imperial defectors. Nevertheless, the attackers prevailed and the Redoubt fell.
Kephess's Redoubt appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the "Explosive Conflict" operation. It serves as a stage for the final boss fight against Kephess in his heavy walker.
